**What is DedifyStack?**

DedifyStack is a true enterprise private cloud with shared storage based on SSD, live migration, failover, dynamic resources, private networks, load balancers, firewalls and hourly billing. Our enterprise private cloud is based on CloudStack and XenServer with SSD shared storage, Infiniband and multiple 10 GBit/s uplinks to meet your enterprise requirements. It is built for customers which want to use enterprise grad cloud environment with shared storage, XenServer and CloudStack.

**DedifyStack Private Cloud**

* Hourly Billing
* CloudStack 4.5
* XenServer 6.5 (PV & HVM)
* SSD SAN storage (shared)
* Dedicated resources (All)
* High availability
* Live migration
* Manually / automatic snapshots
* Affinity zones
* Private networks
* Load balancer
* IPSec VPN into your private cloud networks
* Firewall
* 2TB Traffic/mo/network
* Reverse DNS (IPv4/IPv6)
* IPv6
* API
